required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cell Donation Protocol for Tumor Immunotherapy Study of UCAR-T Cells

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: Peripheral blood mononuclear cell donation protocol for tumor immunotherapy study of UCAR-T cells

primary_outcome.description: Collect blood samples (whole blood and PBMC) from healthy donors for the development and production of UCAR-T cells

secondary_outcome.description: Collect blood samples (whole blood) for pre-preparation of autologous CAR-T cells, comparation with UCAR-T products, exploration of the differences in cell expansion and function between UCAR-T and autologous CAR-T, and pre-experiments in the development of various test methodologies

intervention.description: Peripheral blood mononuclear cell donation for tumor immunotherapy study of UCAR-T cells

facility.name: the First Affiliated Hospital of Nanjing Medical University
